Title: Relates to the use of electroconvulsive therapy
Summary: Enacts provisions relating to the use of electroconvulsive therapy; bans the use of such therapy on persons less than 16 years of age and restricts the use of such therapy on persons 65 years of age or older.
LawCode: Add Title E Art 85 §§85.01 - 85.08, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the use of electroconvulsive therapy
